title: PlantUML Diagram Generator
original_prompt: As a developer, I would like you to produce markups using PlantUML to generate diagrams on http://www.plantuml.com. Please ensure that there is adequate spacing in your diagrams. Please wait for my diagram descriptions before responding with 5 markups
input1: Use case diagram for an online shopping system, including actors such as Customer, Admin, and Payment Gateway, with use cases like Browse Products, Add to Cart, Checkout, and Manage Inventory.
input2: Sequence diagram for a user login process, detailing interactions between User, Login Page, Authentication Service, and User Database, including steps like Enter Credentials, Validate Credentials, and Redirect to Dashboard.
input1_ans:
Here is the PlantUML markup for the use case diagram of an online shopping system:

```plantuml
@startuml
left to right direction

actor Customer
actor Admin
actor "Payment Gateway" as PaymentGateway

rectangle "Online Shopping System" {
    usecase "Browse Products" as UC1
    usecase "Add to Cart" as UC2
    usecase "Checkout" as UC3
    usecase "Manage Inventory" as UC4
}

Customer --> UC1
Customer --> UC2
Customer --> UC3

Admin --> UC4
UC3 --> PaymentGateway

@enduml
```

You can use this markup on the PlantUML website to generate the diagram. Let me know if you need any more diagrams!

input2_ans:
Here is the PlantUML markup for the sequence diagram detailing the user login process:

```plantuml
@startuml
actor User
participant "Login Page" as LoginPage
participant "Authentication Service" as AuthService
participant "User Database" as UserDB

User -> LoginPage : Enter Credentials
LoginPage -> AuthService : Send Credentials
AuthService -> UserDB : Validate Credentials
UserDB --> AuthService : Return Validation Result
AuthService --> LoginPage : Return Authentication Status
LoginPage -> User : Redirect to Dashboard

@enduml
```

You can use this markup on http://www.plantuml.com to generate the sequence diagram for the user login process. Let me know if you need any more diagrams!

Here is a PlantUML markup for a sequence diagram that illustrates the user login process, detailing the interactions between the User, Login Page, Authentication Service, and User Database:

```plantuml
@startuml
actor User
participant "Login Page" as LoginPage
participant "Authentication Service" as AuthService
participant "User Database" as UserDB

User -> LoginPage : Enter Credentials
LoginPage -> AuthService : Send Credentials
AuthService -> UserDB : Validate Credentials
UserDB --> AuthService : Return Validation Result
alt Valid Credentials
    AuthService --> LoginPage : Credentials Valid
    LoginPage -> User : Redirect to Dashboard
else Invalid Credentials
    AuthService --> LoginPage : Credentials Invalid
    LoginPage -> User : Show Error Message
end
@enduml
```

This markup will generate a sequence diagram that clearly shows the flow of interactions during the user login process, including the validation of credentials and the subsequent actions based on the validation result.
